text:
WholeSavr | Backend developers (NodeJS) & Frontend developers (ReactJs)| India - (Anywhere) | Full Time | REMOTE/ONSITE

We are building a product in a live streaming space. Our backend and streaming teams use Kurento Media Servers and a custom version of streaming server. We currently are hiring people in India for two open positions.

Frontend Engineer (ES6/ReactJS) - Experience in ReactJS is absolutely necessary. Knowledge and experience with ReactNative will be preferred. (Exp 2+ years needed)

Backend Engineer (ES6/NodeJS) - Experience in NodeJS is necessary and should be able to work with API fluently. (Exp 2+ years needed)

To apply, please send your resumes/cv at techservices (at) wholesavr (dot) com. Do add [HN] in the title.
